info.title: SchoolDigger API V1
info.description: Get detailed data on over 120,000 schools and 18,500 districts in the U.S.

get.description: Search the SchoolDigger database for districts. You may use any combination of criteria as query parameters.

parameters.name: st
parameters.description: Two character state (e.g. 'CA') - required

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search term - note: will match district name or city (optional)

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Search for districts in this city (optional)

parameters.name: zip
parameters.description: Search for districts in this 5-digit zip code (optional)

parameters.name: nearLatitude
parameters.description: Search for districts within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (e.g. 44.982560) (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only. Enterprise API level will flag districts that include lat/long in its attendance boundary.)

parameters.name: nearLongitude
parameters.description: Search for districts within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (e.g. -124.289185) (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only. Enterprise API level will flag districts that include lat/long in its attendance boundary.)

parameters.name: boundaryAddress
parameters.description: Full U.S. address: flag returned districts that include this address in its attendance boundary. Example: '123 Main St. AnyTown CA 90001' (optional) (Enterprise API level only)

parameters.name: distanceMiles
parameters.description: Search for districts within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (Default 5 miles) (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only)

parameters.name: isInBoundaryOnly
parameters.description: Return only the districts that include given location (nearLatitdue/nearLongitude) or (nearAddress) in its attendance boundary (Enterprise API level only)

parameters.name: boxLatitudeNW
parameters.description: Search for districts within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional)

parameters.name: boxLongitudeNW
parameters.description: Search for districts within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional)

parameters.name: boxLatitudeSE
parameters.description: Search for districts within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional)

parameters.name: boxLongitudeSE
parameters.description: Search for districts within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to retrieve (optional, default: 1)

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of districts to retrieve on a page (50 max) (optional, default: 10)

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort list. Values are: districtname, distance, rank. For descending order, preceed with '-' i.e. -districtname (optional, default: districtname)

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: Your API app id

parameters.name: appKey
parameters.description: Your API app key

get.summary: Returns a detailed record for one district
get.description: Retrieve a single district record from the SchoolDigger database

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The 7 digit District ID (e.g. 0642150)

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: Your API app id

parameters.name: appKey
parameters.description: Your API app key

get.summary: Returns a SchoolDigger district ranking list

parameters.name: st
parameters.description: Two character state (e.g. 'CA')

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The ranking year (leave blank for most recent year)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to retrieve (optional, default: 1)

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of districts to retrieve on a page (50 max) (optional, default: 10)

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: Your API app id

parameters.name: appKey
parameters.description: Your API app key

get.summary: Returns a SchoolDigger school ranking list

parameters.name: st
parameters.description: Two character state (e.g. 'CA')

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The ranking year (leave blank for most recent year)

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: Level of ranking: 'Elementary', 'Middle', or 'High'

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to retrieve (optional, default: 1)

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of districts to retrieve on a page (50 max) (optional, default: 10)

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: Your API app id

parameters.name: appKey
parameters.description: Your API app key

get.description: Search the SchoolDigger database for schools. You may use any combination of criteria as query parameters.

parameters.name: st
parameters.description: Two character state (e.g. 'CA') - required

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search term - note: will match district name or city (optional)

parameters.name: districtID
parameters.description: Search for schools within this district (7 digit district id) (optional)

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: Level of ranking: 'Elementary', 'Middle', or 'High'

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Search for districts in this city (optional)

parameters.name: zip
parameters.description: Search for districts in this 5-digit zip code (optional)

parameters.name: isMagnet
parameters.description: True = return only magnet schools, False = return only non-magnet schools (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only)

parameters.name: isCharter
parameters.description: True = return only charter schools, False = return only non-charter schools (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only)

parameters.name: isVirtual
parameters.description: True = return only virtual schools, False = return only non-virtual schools (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only)

parameters.name: isTitleI
parameters.description: True = return only Title I schools, False = return only non-Title I schools (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only)

parameters.name: isTitleISchoolwide
parameters.description: True = return only Title I schoolwide schools, False = return only non-Title I Schoolwide schools (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only)

parameters.name: nearLatitude
parameters.description: Search for districts within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (e.g. 44.982560) (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only. Enterprise API level will flag districts that include lat/long in its attendance boundary.)

parameters.name: nearLongitude
parameters.description: Search for districts within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (e.g. -124.289185) (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only. Enterprise API level will flag districts that include lat/long in its attendance boundary.)

parameters.name: boundaryAddress
parameters.description: Full U.S. address: flag returned districts that include this address in its attendance boundary. Example: '123 Main St. AnyTown CA 90001' (optional) (Enterprise API level only)

parameters.name: distanceMiles
parameters.description: Search for districts within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (Default 5 miles) (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only)

parameters.name: isInBoundaryOnly
parameters.description: Return only the districts that include given location (nearLatitdue/nearLongitude) or (nearAddress) in its attendance boundary (Enterprise API level only)

parameters.name: boxLatitudeNW
parameters.description: Search for districts within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional)

parameters.name: boxLongitudeNW
parameters.description: Search for districts within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional)

parameters.name: boxLatitudeSE
parameters.description: Search for districts within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional)

parameters.name: boxLongitudeSE
parameters.description: Search for districts within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to retrieve (optional, default: 1)

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of districts to retrieve on a page (50 max) (optional, default: 10)

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort list. Values are: districtname, distance, rank. For descending order, preceed with '-' i.e. -districtname (optional, default: districtname)

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: Your API app id

parameters.name: appKey
parameters.description: Your API app key

get.summary: Returns a detailed record for one school
get.description: Retrieve a school record from the SchoolDigger database

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The 7 digit District ID (e.g. 0642150)

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: Your API app id

parameters.name: appKey
parameters.description: Your API app key

hasBoundary.description: States whether there is a boundary available

polylineCollection.description: Collection of one or more polylines that can be used to create the boundary on a map. NOTE: this value is JSON encoded. Specifically, backslashes will be returned escaped (two backslashes). Make sure to decode the polyline before you use it

countyName.description: County in which the school or district is located

countyURL.description: SchoolDigger URL for all schools in this county

highGrade.description: The high grade served by this district

isWithinBoundary.description: Indicates whether this district's boundary includes the specified location from fromLatitude/fromLongitude

lowGrade.description: The low grade served by this district (PK = Prekindergarten, K = Kindergarten)

rankHistory.description: SchoolDigger yearly rank history of the district

testScores.description: Test scores (district and state) -- requires Pro or Enterprise level API subscription

hasBoundary.description: States whether there is a boundary available

highGrade.description: The high grade served by this district

isWithinBoundary.description: Indicates whether this district's boundary includes the specified location from fromLatitude/fromLongitude

locationIsWithinBoundary.description: Indicates whether this school's boundary includes the specified location from fromLatitude/fromLongitude or boundaryAddress (Enterprise API level)

lowGrade.description: The low grade served by this district (PK = Prekindergarten, K = Kindergarten)

rankHistory.description: SchoolDigger yearly rank history of the district

testScores.description: Test scores (district and state) -- requires Pro or Enterprise level API subscription

numberOfDistricts.description: The total count of districts that match your query

numberOfPages.description: The total count of pages in your query list based on given per_page value

numberOfDistricts.description: The total count of districts that match your query

numberOfPages.description: The total count of pages in your query list based on given per_page value

rankYearsAvailable.description: The years for which SchoolDigger district rankings are available for this state

rankURL.description: The URL to see the district in the SchoolDigger ranking list

rankOf.description: Count of district ranked in this state

rankScore.description: The rank score calculated by SchoolDigger (see https://www.schooldigger.com/aboutranking.aspx)

rankStars.description: The number of stars SchoolDigger awarded in the ranking of the district (0-5, 5 is best)

rankStatewidePercentage.description: Percentile of this district's rank (e.g. this district performed better than (x)% of this state's districts)

numberOfAids.description: Number of full-time equivalent instructional aids employed by the district

numberOfCoordsSupervisors.description: Number of full-time equivalent instructional coordinators/supervisors employed by the district

numberOfEnglishLanguageLearnerStudents.description: The number of English language learner (ELL) students served in appropriate programs

numberOfGuidanceElem.description: Number of full-time equivalent elementary guidance counselors employed by the district

numberOfGuidanceSecondary.description: Number of full-time equivalent secondary guidance counselors employed by the district

numberOfGuidanceTotal.description: Total number of full-time equivalent guidance counselors employed by the district

numberOfLEAAdministrators.description: Number of full-time equivalent LEA administrators employed by the district (LEA)

numberOfLEASupportStaff.description: Number of full-time equivalent LEA administrative support staff employed by the district (LEA)

numberOfLibrarians.description: Number of full-time equivalent librarians/media specialists employed by the district

numberOfLibraryStaff.description: Number of full-time equivalent librarians/media support staff employed by the district

numberOfOtherSupportStaff.description: Number of full-time equivalent all other support staff employed by the district (LEA)

numberOfSchoolAdminSupportStaff.description: Number of full-time equivalent school administrative support staff employed by the district (LEA)

numberOfSchoolAdministrators.description: Number of full-time equivalent school administrators employed by the district (LEA)

numberOfSpecialEdStudents.description: The number of students having a written Individualized Education Program (IEP) under the Individuals With Disabilities Education Act (IDEA)

numberOfStudentSupportStaff.description: Number of full-time equivalent student support services staff employed by the district (LEA)

numberOfStudents.description: Number of students enrolled in the district

numberOfTeachers.description: Number of full-time equivalent teachers employed by the district

numberOfTeachersElementary.description: Number of full-time equivalent elementary teachers employed by the district

numberOfTeachersK.description: Number of full-time equivalent kindergarten teachers employed by the district

numberOfTeachersPK.description: Number of full-time equivalent pre-kindergarten teachers employed by the district

numberOfTeachersSecondary.description: Number of full-time equivalent secondary teachers employed by the district

cityURL.description: SchoolDigger URL for schools in this city

latLong.description: Latitude/longitude of school address (Pro and Enterprise API levels only)

zipURL.description: SchoolDigger URL for schools in this zip code

numberEncodedPoints.description: Number of encoded points in polyline

polylineOverlayEncodedPoints.description: Polyline for use with Google Maps or other mapping software. NOTE: this value is JSON encoded. Specifically, backslashes will be returned escaped (two backslashes). Make sure to decode the polyline before you use it

averageStandardScore.description: The Average Standard score calculated by SchoolDigger (see: https://www.schooldigger.com/aboutrankingmethodology.aspx)

rankLevel.description: The level for which this school is ranked (Elementary, Middle, High)

rankOf.description: Count of district ranked in this state

rankStars.description: The number of stars SchoolDigger awarded in the ranking of the district (0-5, 5 is best)

rankStatewidePercentage.description: Percentile of this district's rank (e.g. this district performed better than (x)% of this state's districts)

highGrade.description: The high grade served by this district

isCharterSchool.description: Indicates if school is a charter school (Yes/No/n-a)

isMagnetSchool.description: Indicates if school is a magnet school (Yes/No/n-a)

isPrivate.description: Indicates if school is a private school (Yes/No)

isTitleISchool.description: Indicates if school is a Title I school (Yes/No/n-a)

isTitleISchoolwideSchool.description: Indicates if a school-wide Title I school (Yes/No/n-a)

isVirtualSchool.description: Indicates if school is a virtual school (Yes/No/n-a)

lowGrade.description: The low grade served by this district (PK = Prekindergarten, K = Kindergarten)

privateDays.description: Days in the school year (private schools only)

privateHasLibrary.description: Indicates if the school has a library (private schools only)

privateHours.description: Hours in the school day (private schools only)

privateOrientation.description: Affiliation of the school (private schools only)

rankHistory.description: SchoolDigger yearly rank history of the district

rankMovement.description: Returns the movement of rank for this school between current and previous year

schoolLevel.description: The level of school (Elementary, Middle, High, Private, Alternative)

testScores.description: Test scores (district and state) -- requires Pro or Enterprise level API subscription

urlCompare.description: SchoolDigger URL for comparing this school to nearby schools

urlCompare.description: SchoolDigger URL for comparing this school to nearby schools

numberOfPages.description: The total count of pages in your query list based on given per_page value

numberOfSchools.description: The total count of schools that match your query

numberOfPages.description: The total count of pages in your query list based on given per_page value

numberOfSchools.description: The total count of schools that match your query

rankYearsAvailable.description: The years for which SchoolDigger district rankings are available for this state

numTier1.description: Count of students performing at tier 1 (Enterprise API level only)

numTier2.description: Count of students performing at tier 2 (Enterprise API level only)

numTier3.description: Count of students performing at tier 3 (Enterprise API level only)

numTier4.description: Count of students performing at tier 4 (Enterprise API level only)

numTier5.description: Count of students performing at tier 5 (Enterprise API level only)

numberMetStandard.description: Count of students meeting state standard

percentMetStandard.description: Percent of students meeting state standard

percentTier1.description: Percent of students performing at tier 1 (Enterprise API level only)

percentTier2.description: Percent of students performing at tier 2 (Enterprise API level only)

percentTier3.description: Percent of students performing at tier 3 (Enterprise API level only)

percentTier4.description: Percent of students performing at tier 4 (Enterprise API level only)

percentTier5.description: Percent of students performing at tier 5 (Enterprise API level only)

studentsEligible.description: Count of students eligible to take test

test.description: The name of the state-administed test

tier1.description: Tier 1 test score description (Enterprise API level only)

tier2.description: Tier 2 test score description (Enterprise API level only)

tier3.description: Tier 3 test score description (Enterprise API level only)

tier4.description: Tier 4 test score description (Enterprise API level only)

tier5.description: Tier 5 test score description (Enterprise API level only)

numberOfStudents.description: Number of students enrolled in the district

numberofAfricanAmericanStudents.description: NCES definition: A person having origins in any of the black racial groups of Africa.  (https://nces.ed.gov/statprog/2002/std1_5.asp)

numberofAsianStudents.description: NCES definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of the Far East, Southeast Asia, or the Indian subcontinent, including, for example, Cambodia, China, India, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Pakistan, the Philippine Islands, Thailand, and Vietnam.  (https://nces.ed.gov/statprog/2002/std1_5.asp)

numberofHispanicStudents.description: NCES definition: A person of Cuban, Mexican, Puerto Rican, South or Central American, or other Spanish culture or origin, regardless of race. (https://nces.ed.gov/statprog/2002/std1_5.asp)

numberofIndianStudents.description: NCES definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of the Far East, Southeast Asia, or the Indian subcontinent, including, for example, Cambodia, China, India, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Pakistan, the Philippine Islands, Thailand, and Vietnam. (https://nces.ed.gov/statprog/2002/std1_5.asp)

numberofPacificIslanderStudents.description: NCES definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Hawaii, Guam, Samoa, or other Pacific Islands. (https://nces.ed.gov/statprog/2002/std1_5.asp)

numberofTwoOrMoreRaceStudents.description: NCES definition: Includes any combination of two or more races and not Hispanic/Latino ethnicity. (https://nces.ed.gov/statprog/2002/std1_5.asp)

numberofWhiteStudents.description: NCES definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Europe, the Middle East, or North Africa. (https://nces.ed.gov/statprog/2002/std1_5.asp)

percentFreeDiscLunch.description: Percent of students receiving a free or discounted lunch in the National School Lunch Program

pupilTeacherRatio.description: Number of students / number of full-time equivalent teachers

teachersFulltime.description: Number of full-time equvalent teachers employed at the school
